meanings.definition: A compound found in cruciferous vegetables such as broccoli, known for its potential health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Broccoli contains sulforaphane that is good for your health.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that sulforaphane in broccoli can help improve well-being.
meanings.sent3: The sulforaphane in broccoli is like a tiny health superhero in your meal.
meanings.sent4: The impact of sulforaphane on health is as powerful as a ray of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: Imagine sulforaphane as a shield protecting your body from harm.
